column4: my school blocks ports, and i'm unable to use irc. i have setup an ssh server on a xubuntu pc. how would i go about connecting to it/forward ports etc? thank you in advance for any help
skillet_: they blocked ports so that students don't use p2p apps. i simply want to get on irc channels. i tried those web aps and chatzilla and am still unable to.
we are not going to get you expelled and maybe even depending on the location break the law
